sentences.sContent: As children we were taught to be frugal and hard-working.
sentences.sCn: 我们小时候被教育要节俭和勤劳。

sentences.sContent: He led a remarkably frugal existence.
sentences.sCn: 他过着极其节俭的生活。

synos.tran: 节俭的；朴素的；花钱少的

remMethod.val: “腐乳过日” → 吃腐乳过日子 → 节约的

trans.tranCn: 节俭的；朴素的；花钱少的
trans.tranOther: careful to buy only what is necessary
